scripts.clean: shx rm -rf packages/*/lib packages/*/out packages/*/*.tsbuildinfo examples/*/*.tsbuildinfo
scripts.watch: concurrently -n tsc,vscode,domainmodel,arithmetics,requirements,statemachine -c blue,yellow,green,green,green,green "tsc -b tsconfig.build.json -w" "npm run watch --workspace=langium-vscode" "npm run watch --workspace=examples/domainmodel" "npm run watch --workspace=examples/arithmetics" "npm run watch --workspace=examples/statemachine" "npm run watch --workspace=examples/requirements"
scripts.build:clean: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.dev-build: npm run dev-clean && npm install && npm link ./packages/langium && npm link ./packages/langium-cli && npm link ./packages/generator-langium
scripts.dev-clean: shx rm -rf packages/**/node_modules && npm uninstall -g langium-workspaces langium-cli generator-langium langium && npm unlink langium-workspaces langium-cli generator-langium langium
